text: I don't need to repeat it twice, I don't give a fuck the first time
author: Jason Statham

text: Tired of sitting without money? Then just stand up
author: Jason Statham

text: There are few vitamins in beer, so you need to drink a lot of it
author: Jason Statham

text: Brine is also part of the family
author: Dominic Toretto

text: You don't need physics and brains if you have a family
author: Dominic Toretto
